analysis.Summary: MusicPlayer.vue is a Vue single-file component that renders a playback bar with track information, playback controls (play/pause, next, previous, shuffle, repeat), a favorite toggle, progress bar and volume control.
analysis.Purpose: This file provides the user interface and interaction logic for the audio player in the application, tying together player state, control actions and media display.

Components.name: MusicPlayer
Components.responsibility: Container component that orchestrates display of track info, controls and volume.

Components.name: Media
Components.responsibility: Displays the album or track cover image, with fallback placeholder.

Components.name: Button
Components.responsibility: Generic button wrapper with loader/success state capabilities.

Components.name: TrackProgress
Components.responsibility: Displays and updates the progress bar for the current track.

Components.name: VolumeControl
Components.responsibility: Provides a slider or control to adjust playback volume.

Components.name: IconPlay / IconPause / IconNext / IconPrevious / IconShuffle / IconRepeat / IconHeart / IconVolume / IconVolumeHalf / IconVolumeMute
Components.responsibility: SVG icon components for various player controls and states.

Functions.name: togglePlay
Functions.description: Toggles play/pause state by dispatching player action.

Functions.name: playNext
Functions.description: Skips to the next track in the queue.

Functions.name: toggleRepeat
Functions.description: Cycles repeat mode between none, all, and single.

Functions.name: toggleFavorite
Functions.description: Toggles a local favorite flag for the current track; placeholder for persistence logic.

Functions.name: getArtistName
Functions.description: Returns a display string for the artist of a given track, handling object or string values and unknown cases.

parameters.name: track
parameters.description: The track object from which to extract artist information.

analysis.Usage: Imported into higher-level views or layouts to provide a persistent audio player at the bottom or top of the app UI. Example: import MusicPlayer from '@/modules/music/components/player/MusicPlayer.vue';
Notes: Uses a fallback '/assets/placeholder-track.jpg' when no cover URL is available.
Favorite toggle is local-only; persistence should be implemented as needed.
Scoped style adds hover effect to the play/pause button.
Repeat icon color reflects current repeat mode via computed property.
VolumeHalf icon reuses the same source as Volume; styling can be adjusted for different states.
